pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ bhattena nimantesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto purebhattaṁ, kulāni payirupāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.5_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.9_0: tatiyampi kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.13_0: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto purebhattaṁ kulāni payirupāsitvā divā āgacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.15_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.16_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.17_1: nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.20_1: nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.23.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.24_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ saṅghassatthāya khādanīyaṁ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.4_0: Atha kho te manussā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhū pucchiṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.6_1: āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.7_1: khādanīyaṁ ayyassa upanandassa dassetvā saṅghassa dātabban”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.11_0: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto—“bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṁ purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjitun”ti pacchābhattaṁ kulāni payirupāsitvā divā paṭikkami, khādanīyaṁ ussāriyittha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.12_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.13_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.20.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.21_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaradānasamaye kukkuccāyantā kulāni na payirupāsanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.6.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.8_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvarakammaṁ karonti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.1_1: attho ca hoti sūciyāpi suttenapi satthakenapi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.6.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.8_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti, attho ca hoti bhesajjehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.6.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.16_0: yena nimantito taṁ antamaso kusaggenapi bhuttaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.18_0: cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.21_0: Paṭhamaṁ pādaṁ ummāraṁ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.26_0: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.1_0: Nimantite nimantitasaññī santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.2_0: Nimantite vematiko santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.3_0: Nimantite animantitasaññī santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
